00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00131 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00132 {
00133     double ans = 0;
00134     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00135     return ans;
00136 }

00150 static R_INLINE double*
00151 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00152 {
00153     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00154     return dest;
00155 }
00156 
00169 static R_INLINE double*
00170 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00171 {
00172     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
00173     return dest;
00174 }

00184 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00185 {
00186     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00187     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00188     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00189 }

00202 static R_INLINE double *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00203 {
00204     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00205     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;

00208 /* FIXME: Instead of this function add elements sigmaML and sigmaREML
00209  * to the deviance slot and fill them whenever d[pwrss_POS] changes.
00210  */
00219 static R_INLINE double
00220 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* d)
00221 {
00222     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? 
00223             sqrt(d[pwrss_POS] / (dims[n_POS] -
00224                             (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))) : 1);
00225 }
00226 
00240 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00241 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00242 {
00243     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00244 
00245     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00246         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00247         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00248 
00249         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00250         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00251         nc[i] = nci;
00252         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00253     }
00254     return ans;
00255 }
00256 
00266 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00267 {
00268     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1;
00269     int nf = dims[nf_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00270     double *b = RANEF_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00271     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00272     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00273     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00274     R_CheckStack(); 
00275 
00276     if (!SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym)) { /* LMM */
00277         double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0};
00278         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00279         R_CheckStack();
00280                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00281         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, fixef, &i1);
00282         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
00283                         fixef, &i1, one, u, &i1);
00284         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00285             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00286         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00287         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00288         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00289         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00290     }
00291     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00292                                 /* inverse permutation */
00293     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[((int*)L->Perm)[i]] = u[i];
00294     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00295         for (int k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00296             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00297             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i];
00298             for (int kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00299         }
00300         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00301             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, one,
00302                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00303         }
00304     }
00305 }
00306 
00316 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00317 {
00318     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00319         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00320         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00321         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00322     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00323         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00324     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00325         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00326         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00327     R_CheckStack();
00328     
00329     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00330     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00331     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00332     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00333         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00334         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00335             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00336             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00337                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00338             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00339         }
00340     }
00341     return R_NilValue;
00342 }
00343 
00352 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00353 {
00354     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00355     int nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00356     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00357         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00358         double *st = REAL(STi);
00359         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00360         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00361 
00362         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00363             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00364         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00365             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00366                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00367     }
00368     return pars;
00369 }

00378 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00379 {
00380     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS]));
00381     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00382 
00383     UNPROTECT(1); 
00384     return ans;
00385 }
00386 
00392 static void update_A(SEXP x)
00393 {
00394     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
00395     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p),
00396         *zi = (int*)(Zt->i), *zp = (int*)(Zt->p), ncmax,
00397         nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
00398     int annz = ap[A->ncol], znnz = zp[Zt->ncol];
00399     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00400     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*), *ax = (double*)(A->x),
00401         *zx = (double*)(Zt->x), one[] = {1,0};
00402     R_CheckStack();
00403 
00404     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00405 
00406     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
00407         Memcpy(ax, zx, znnz);
00408     } else { /* Only for nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00409         AZERO(ax, annz);        /* Initialize potential nonzeros to 0 */
00410         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00411             int pa = ap[j];
00412             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00413                 while (ai[pa] < zi[p]) pa++;          /* matching pos in A */
00414                 if (ai[pa] != zi[p])
00415                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and A structures, j = %d"), j);
00416                 ax[pa] = zx[p];
00417             }
00418         }
00419     }
00420                                 /* When T != I multiply A on the left by T' */
00421     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00422         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00423             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1];) {
00424                 int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00425 
00426                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00427                 else {
00428                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00429                     while ((ai[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00430                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00431                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00432                                     one, st[i], nc + i, ax + p, &nr);
00433                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00434                 }
00435             }
00436                                 /* Multiply A on the left by S */
00437     for (int p = 0; p < annz; p++) {
00438         int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00439         ax[p] *= st[i][((ai[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00440     }
00441 }
00442 
00450 static void
00451 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00452 {
00453     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), ncmax, nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS], pos = 0;
00454     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00455     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00456     R_CheckStack();
00457 
00458     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00459                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00460     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00461         int nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00462         double *sti = st[i];
00463 
00464         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00465             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00466         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00467             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00468                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00469     }
00470     update_A(x);
00471 }

00483 {

00486     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00487         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00488     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00489     return R_NilValue;

00500 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00501 {
00502     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x),
00503         w = LENGTH(which) ? asInteger(which) : 0;
00504     
00505     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && dims[isREML_POS]), dims,
00506                                 DEV_SLOT(x)));
00507 }
00508 
00516 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00517 {
00518     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00519         *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00520     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00521     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00522     int i, j, k;
00523     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00524     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00525     CHM_DN dm1;
00526     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00527     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00528         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00529     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00530     R_CheckStack();
00531 
00532     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00533     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00534     sc = get_sigma(dims[isREML_POS], dims, DEV_SLOT(x));
00535     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00536         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00537         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00538                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00539                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00540 
00541         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00542         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00543         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00544         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00545             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00546         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00547             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00548             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00549                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
00550             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00551             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00552             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00553             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00554             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00555             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00556             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00557             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00558             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00559                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00560                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00561                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00562                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00563             }
00564         }
00565         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00566     }
00567     UNPROTECT(1);
00568     return ans;
00569 }
00570 
00579 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
00580 {
00581     double one[] = {1, 0};
00582     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
00583     CHM_FR L;
00584     R_CheckStack();
00585 
00586     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
00587     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00588         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00589               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00590 
00591     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00592 }
00593 
00594 
00595 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00596 
00597 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00598 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00599 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00600 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00601 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00602 
00615 static void
00616 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int lTyp)
00617 {
00618     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00619         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00620         switch(lTyp) {
00621         case 1:         /* logit */
00622             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00623             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00624             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00625             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00626             break;
00627         case 2:         /* probit */
00628             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00629                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00630                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00631             }
00632             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00633                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00634                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00635             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00636             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00637             break;
00638         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00639             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00640             break;
00641         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00642             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00643             break;
00644         case 5:         /* identity */
00645             mu[i] = eta[i];
00646             muEta[i] = 1.;
00647             break;
00648         case 6:         /* log */
00649             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00650             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00651                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00652             break;
00653         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00654             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00655             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00656             break;
00657         default:
00658             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00659         }
00660     }
00661 }
00662 
00673 static void
00674 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00675 {
00676     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00677         double mui = mu[i];
00678         switch(vTyp) {
00679         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00680             var[i] = 1.;
00681             break;
00682         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00683             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00684                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00685                       mu, i);
00686             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00687             break;
00688         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00689             if (mui <= 0)
00690                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00691             var[i] = mui;
00692             break;
00693         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00694             if (mui <= 0)
00695                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00696             var[i] = mui * mui;
00697             break;
00698         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00699             if (mui <= 0)
00700                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00701             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00702             break;
00703         default:
00704             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00705         }
00706     }
00707 }
00708 
00717 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00718 {
00719     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00720 }
00721 
00735 static double
00736 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00737               int n, int vTyp)
00738 {
00739     double ans = 0.;
00740     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00741         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00742         double ri = yi - mui;
00743         switch(vTyp) {
00744         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00745             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00746             break;
00747         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00748             ans += 2 * wi *
00749                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00750             break;
00751         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00752             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00753             break;
00754         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00755             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00756             break;
00757         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00758             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00759             break;
00760         default:
00761             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00762         }
00763     }
00764     return ans;
00765 }
00766 
00776 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00777 {
00778     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00779     int i, i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00780     int ns = n * s;
00781     double *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
00782         *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = ETA_SLOT(x),
00783         *etaold = (double*) NULL, *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00784         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00785         *offset = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00786         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00787         *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
00788         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00789         *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00790     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00791     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00792     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00793     R_CheckStack();
00794 
00795     if (V) {
00796         etaold = eta;
00797         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00798     }
00799                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00800     for (i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00801                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00802     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one, X_SLOT(x), &ns,
00803                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, one, eta, &i1);
00804                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00805     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00806     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00807     R_CheckStack();
00808     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00809         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00810     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00811 
00812     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00813         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00814             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00815         int *gdims;
00816         
00817         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00818             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00819         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00820             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00821                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00822             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00823                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00824                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00825             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00826         }
00827         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00828         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00829             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00830         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00831         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00832             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00833         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00834         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00835             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00836                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00837                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00838                                  * pnames has been checked */
00839         Free(eta);
00840         eta = etaold;
00841         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00842         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00843         UNPROTECT(1);
00844     }
00845 
00846     if (muEta) {
00847         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00848         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00849     } else {
00850         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00851     }
00852 
00853     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00854     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00855         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00856         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00857     }
00858                                 /* store u'u */
00859     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00860     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00861 }
00862 
00873 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00874 {
00875     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00876 }
00877 
00888 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00889 {
00890     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00891     int n = dims[n_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00892     double
00893         *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
00894         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00895         *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00896         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00897         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00898         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00899         *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_pWtSym),
00900         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00901         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00902         *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00903         *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00904     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00905     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00906     R_CheckStack();
00907     
00908     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00909         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00910         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00911             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
00912             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00913             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00914         }
00915     }
00916     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00917         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p, i, j;
00918         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00919         CHM_SP C = A;
00920 
00921         for (j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00922             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00923                 int ja = i + j * n;
00924                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00925                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) *
00926                     (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00927             }
00928         }
00929         if (s == 1) {           /* C is a scaled version of A */
00930             for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00931                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00932                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00933             A->x = (void*)cx;
00934         } else {
00935             int *ci, *cp, pa, pc;
00936             C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00937             R_CheckStack();
00938 
00939             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00940             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00941             for (j = 0; j < s; j++)
00942                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00943                     int ja = i + j * n;
00944                     for (pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00945                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00946                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00947                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00948                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00949                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00950                     }
00951                 }
00952             A = C;
00953         }
00954     }
00955     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00956         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00957               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00958 
00959     d[ldL2_POS] = 0;            /* evaluate log(det(L))^2 */
00960     if (L->is_super) {
00961         int i;
00962         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00963             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00964                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00965             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00966 
00967             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00968                 d[ldL2_POS] += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00969             }
00970         }
00971     } else {
00972         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00973         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00974         
00975         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00976             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00977             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00978             d[ldL2_POS] += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00979         }
00980     }
00981     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00982 }
00983 
00995 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00996 {
00997     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00998 }
00999 
01001 #define CM_MAXITER  300
01002 
01003 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
01004 
01005 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
01006 
01016 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
01017 {
01018     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01019     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01020     double *Cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
01021         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
01022         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
01023         *u = U_SLOT(x),
01024         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
01025         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
01026     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
01027         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01028     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01029     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
01030         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
01031     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01032     R_CheckStack();
01033     
01034     if (!sXwt) return(0);       /* nothing to do for LMMs */
01035     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
01036     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
01037     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
01038         C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01039         R_CheckStack();
01040         C->x = (void*)Cx;
01041     }
01042     
01043     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
01044      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
01045      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
01046      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
01047     AZERO(u, q);
01048     update_mu(x);
01049     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
01050         
01051         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
01052         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
01053                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
01054         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01055         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01056         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01057                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01058         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01059                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01060         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01061             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01062         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01063         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01064                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01065         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01066         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01067                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01068         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01069             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01070         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01071         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01072 
01073         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01074             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01075             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01076             if (verb < 0)
01077                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01078                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01079             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01080                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01081                 break;
01082             }
01083         }
01084         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01085     }
01086     return i;
01087 }
01088 
01100 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01101 {
01102     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01103 }
01104 
01105 /* FIXME: change this to use the variance type slot.  If
01106  * dims[useSc_POS] is nonzero then use the formula for the profiled
01107  * deviance.  (Does everything work out nicely if sigma is identically
01108  * 1 when useSc is false?)
01109  */
01110 
01118 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01119 {
01120     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x);
01121     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01122 
01123     d[disc_POS] = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym) ?
01124         lme4_devResid(MU_SLOT(x),
01125                       REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pWtSym)),
01126                       Y_SLOT(x), dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]) :
01127         d[wrss_POS];
01128     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01129     return R_NilValue;
01130 }
01131 
01142 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01143 {
01144     update_ranef(x);
01145     return R_NilValue;
01146 }
01147 
01158 static void
01159 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01160          const double *X, int nc)
01161 {
01162     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
01163     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
01164     R_CheckStack();
01165 
01166     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
01167         AZERO(tmp, m);
01168         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01169             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01170                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
01171         }
01172         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
01173     }
01174 }
01175         
01184 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01185 {
01186     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), free_X = 0, i, i1 = 1, j, k;
01187     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
01188     double *X = X_SLOT(x), *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
01189         *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef, *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x),
01190         *RX = RX_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
01191         *u, *y = Y_SLOT(x), dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01192         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01193     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
01194     CHM_DN cRZX = N_AS_CHM_DN(RZX, q, p), ans, cu;
01195     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01196     R_CheckStack();
01197 
01198     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
01199         double *WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
01200 
01201         free_X = 1;
01202         AZERO(WX, n * p);
01203         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01204             for (k = 0; k < s; k++)
01205                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01206                     WX[i + j * n] +=
01207                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
01208         X = WX;
01209 
01210         /* Replace A by C, either x component or entire matrix */
01211         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
01212         else {
01213             A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01214             R_CheckStack();
01215         }
01216     }
01217                                 /* solve L %*% RZX = PAW^{1/2}GHX */
01218     P_sdmult(RZX, (int*)L->Perm, A, X, p); /* right-hand side */
01219     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRZX, &c); /* solution */
01220     Memcpy(RZX, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
01221     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01222                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
01223     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, RX, &p); /* X'X */
01224     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, RZX, &q, one, RX, &p);
01225     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, RX, &p, &j);
01226     if (j)
01227         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), j);
01228                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
01229     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < p; j++)
01230         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(RX[j * (p + 1)]);
01231 
01232     if (free_X) Free(X);
01233     if (SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym) || SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) {
01234         return d[ML_POS];
01235     }
01236                                 /* linear mixed models only */
01237     fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01238     u = U_SLOT(x);
01239     cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01240     R_CheckStack();
01241                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
01242     if (sXwt) {
01243         double *tmp = Calloc(n, double);
01244         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) tmp[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
01245         y = tmp;
01246     }
01247     P_sdmult(u, (int*)L->Perm, A, y, 1);
01248     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
01249     Memcpy(u, (double*)ans->x, q);
01250     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01251                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
01252     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n, y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
01253     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, RZX, &q,
01254                     u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
01255     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, RX, &p, fixef, &i1);
01256     d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
01257         - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
01258     if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
01259         error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
01260     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01261         dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
01262     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01263         dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01264 
01265     if (sXwt) Free(y);
01266     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01267 }
01268 
01276 SEXP
01277 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01278 {
01279     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01280 }
01281 
01291 SEXP 
01292 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01293 {
01294     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01295     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x),
01296         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01297     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01298                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym))),
01299         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01300 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe).
01301  * Not really but we do need to profile out the scale parameter when
01302  * useSc is TRUE. */
01303     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01304     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01305     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01306     double *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01307     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01308     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01309         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01310     R_CheckStack();
01311 
01312     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01313     if (!lmm) {
01314         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01315 
01316         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01317         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01318         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01319         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01320     }
01321                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01322     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01323     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01324                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01325     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01326         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01327     }
01328                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01329     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01330         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01331         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01332         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01333     }
01334     do {
01335         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01336 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01337  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01338  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01339  * zero. */
01340         if (lmm) {
01341             update_L(x);
01342             fx = update_RX(x);
01343         } else {
01344             
01345             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01346             update_u(x, verb);
01347             mer_update_dev(x);
01348             fx = DEV_SLOT(x)[ML_POS];
01349         }
01350         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01351     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01352     update_RX(x);
01353     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01354     return R_NilValue;
01355 }
01356 
01357 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01358 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01359 
01372 static double
01373 *std_rWishart_factor(double nu, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01374 {
01375     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01376 
01377     if (nu < (double) p || p <= 0)
01378         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01379 
01380     AZERO(ans, p * p);
01381     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01382         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(nu - (double) j));
01383         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01384             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01385                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01386             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01387             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01388         }
01389     }
01390     return ans;
01391 }
01392 
01402 SEXP
01403 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP nuP, SEXP scal)
01404 {
01405     SEXP ans;
01406     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01407         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01408     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, nu = asReal(nuP), one = 1, zero = 0;
01409 
01410     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01411         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01412     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01413     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01414     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01415     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01416     R_CheckStack();
01417 
01418     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01419     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01420     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01421     if (j)
01422         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01423     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01424     ansp = REAL(ans);
01425     GetRNGstate();
01426     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01427         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01428         std_rWishart_factor(nu, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01429         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01430                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01431         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01432                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01433                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01434 
01435         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01436             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01437                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01438     }
01439 
01440     PutRNGstate();
01441     UNPROTECT(1);
01442     return ans;
01443 }
01444 
01445 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01446 
01458 static void MCMC_beta_u(SEXP x, double sigma, double *fvals, double *rvals)
01459 {
01460     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01461     int i1 = 1, j, p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01462     double *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
01463         *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01464         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01465         *u = U_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01466     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01467     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01468     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01469     R_CheckStack();
01470 
01471     if (V || muEta) {
01472         error(_("Update not yet written"));
01473     } else {                    /* Linear mixed model */
01474         update_L(x);
01475         update_RX(x);
01476         update_ranef(x);     /* Provides conditional beta-hat and u */
01477                                 /* Update beta */
01478         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01479         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, del2, &i1);
01480         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fixef[j] += del2[j];
01481                                 /* Update u */
01482         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01483         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
01484                         del2, &i1, one, del1, &i1);
01485         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01486         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01487         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01488         update_mu(x);        /* and parts of the deviance slot */
01489     }
01490     Memcpy(fvals, fixef, p);
01491     if (rvals) {
01492         update_ranef(x);
01493         Memcpy(rvals, RANEF_SLOT(x), q);
01494     }
01495 }
01496 
01506 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals)
01507 {
01508     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
01509     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS], pos = 0;
01510     double *Ptu = Calloc(q, double), *u = U_SLOT(x);
01511     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01512     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01513     R_CheckStack();
01514 
01515     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01516                                 /* inverse permutation of u */
01517     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) Ptu[perm[j]] = u[j];
01518 
01519     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01520         int qi = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01521         double *sti = st[i], *ui = Ptu + Gp[i];
01522 
01523         if (qi == 1) {
01524             *sti *= sqrt(sqr_length(ui, nl)/rchisq((double)nl))/sigma;
01525             vals[pos++] = *sti;
01526         } else {
01527             int info, j, k, qisq = qi * qi, qip1 = qi + 1;
01528             double invsigsq = 1/(sigma * sigma), one[] = {1,0}, zer[] = {0,0};
01529 
01530             double *scal = Alloca(qisq, double), *tmp = Alloca(qisq, double);
01531             R_CheckStack();
01532                                 /* scal := crossprod(U_i)/sigma^2 */
01533             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &nl, &invsigsq, ui, &nl,
01534                             zer, scal, &qi); 
01535 /*          safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", qi, 1e-7); */
01536             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, scal, &qi, &info);
01537             if (info)
01538                 error(_("scal matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
01539             /* solve W_i' B_i = R_i for W_i a random std Wishart factor */
01540             F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "L", "T", "N", &qi, &qi, one,
01541                             std_rWishart_factor((double)(nl - qi + 1), qi, 0, tmp),
01542                             &qi, scal, &qi);
01543                                 /* B_i := T(theta) %*% S(theta) %*% B_i */
01544             for (k = 0; k < qi; k++)
01545                 for (j = 0; j < qi; j++)
01546                     scal[j * qi + k] *= st[i][k * qip1];
01547             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", &qi, &qi, one, st[i], &qi, scal, &qi);
01548                                 /* Create the lower Cholesky factor */
01549             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &qi, one, scal, &qi, zer, tmp, &qi); 
01550             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, tmp, &qi, &info);
01551             if (info)
01552                 error(_("crossproduct matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
01553                                 /* Update S_i and T_i */
01554             for (j = 0; j < qi; j++) {
01555                 double dj;
01556                 vals[pos++] = st[i][j * qip1] = dj = tmp[j * qip1];
01557                 for (k = j + 1; k < qi; k++)
01558                     vals[pos++] = st[i][j * qi + k] = tmp[j * qi + k]/dj;
01559             }
01560         }
01561     }
01562     update_A(x);
01563     Free(Ptu);
01564 }
01565 
01574 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP fm)
01575 {
01576     SEXP devsamp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym);
01577     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), nsamp = LENGTH(devsamp);
01578     int np = dims[np_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01579     double
01580         *STsamp = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)),
01581         *d = DEV_SLOT(fm),
01582         *dev = REAL(devsamp),
01583         *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym),
01584         *fixsamp = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01585         *resamp = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_ranefSym);
01586 
01587     GetRNGstate();
01588     /* The first column of storage slots contains the fitted values */
01589     for (int i = 1; i < nsamp; i++) {
01590         if (sig)                /* update and store sigma */
01591             sig[i] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq((double)dims[n_POS]));
01592                                 /* update ST and A */
01593         MCMC_ST(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, STsamp + i * np);   
01594                         /* update L, RX, beta, u, eta, mu, res and d */
01595         MCMC_beta_u(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, fixsamp + i * p,
01596                     resamp + (resamp ? i : 0) * q); 
01597         dev[i] = d[ML_POS];
01598     }
01599     PutRNGstate();
01600                 /* Restore pars from the first columns of the samples */
01601     ST_setPars(fm, STsamp);
01602     Memcpy(FIXEF_SLOT(fm), fixsamp, p);
01603     update_u(fm, 0);
01604     update_L(fm);
01605     update_RX(fm);
01606     update_ranef(fm);
01607 
01608     return x;
01609 }
01610 
01611 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01612 
01613 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01614 #endif  
01615 
01629 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01630 {
01631     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01632     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01633     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01634         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01635                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01636                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01637     return 0;
01638 }
01639 
01652 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01653 {
01654     int ll;
01655 
01656     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01657         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01658                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01659     return 0;
01660 }
01661 
01670 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01671 {
01672     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01673         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01674         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01675         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01676         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym);
01677     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01678     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01679         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01680     int nv = n * s;
01681     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x), A =  A_SLOT(x);
01682     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01683     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01684     R_CheckStack();
01685                                 /* check lengths */
01686     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01687         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01688     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01689         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01690     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01691         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01692     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01693         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01694         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01695     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01696         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01697         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01698     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01699         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01700     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01701         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01702     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01703         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01704     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01705     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01706     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01707     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01708     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01709     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01710     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01711     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01712     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01713     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01714     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01715     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01716     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01717     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01718     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RZXSym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01719     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXSym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01720 
01721     nq = 0;
01722     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01723         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01724         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01725         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01726             return
01727                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01728         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01729             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01730         if (!isFactor(fli))
01731             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01732         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01733     }
01734     if (q != nq)
01735         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01736     return ScalarLogical(1);
01737 }
01738 
01739 SEXP merMCMC_validate(SEXP x)
01740 {
01741     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01742         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01743         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym);
01744     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01745     int nf = dd[nf_POS], np = dd[np_POS], nsamp = LENGTH(devianceP),
01746         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS];
01747     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01748     R_CheckStack();
01749                                 /* check lengths */
01750     if (nsamp <= 0)
01751         return mkString(_("number of samples must be positive"));
01752     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01753         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01754         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01755     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01756         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01757     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01758         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01759 
01760     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ncSym, nf, 0))
01761         return(mkString(buf));
01762     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sigmaSym, nsamp, !dd[useSc_POS]))
01763         return(mkString(buf));
01764     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_STSym, np, nsamp))
01765         return(mkString(buf));
01766     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, nsamp))
01767         return(mkString(buf));
01768     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)))
01769         if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, nsamp))
01770             return(mkString(buf));
01771     return ScalarLogical(1);
01772 }
01773 
01774 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01775 
01785 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01786 {
01787     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01788     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01789         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01790         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01791         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01792         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01793     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01794 
01795     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01796     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01797     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01798         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01799         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01800             F[i] = 0;
01801             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01802         } else {
01803             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01804                 F[i] = 0;
01805                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01806             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01807                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01808                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01809                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01810                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01811                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01812                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01813                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01814                             int ii = ai[k];
01815                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01816                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01817                         }
01818                     }
01819                 }
01820             }
01821         }
01822         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01823     }
01824     return ans;
01825 }
01826 
01827 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01840 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01841 {
01842     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01843     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01844     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01845         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01846         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01847     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01848       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01849     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01850         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01851     R_CheckStack();
01852     
01853     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01854     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01855         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01856         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01857         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01858     }
01859     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01860     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01861     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01862     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01863         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01864         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01865                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01866         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01867         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01868             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01869         }
01870         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01871             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01872         }
01873     
01874         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01875         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01876         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01877         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01878             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01879             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01880             if (S) {
01881                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01882                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01883                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01884                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01885                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01886             }
01887             if (D) {
01888                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01889                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01890             }
01891             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01892             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01893             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01894                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01895                                       * evaluated */
01896         } 
01897     }
01898     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01899     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01900     UNPROTECT(1);
01901     return ans;
01902 }
01903 
01912 SEXP spR_update_mu(SEXP x)
01913 {
01914     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01915     int n = dims[n_POS];
01916     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
01917         *eta = Calloc(n, double),
01918         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01919         *offset = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_offsetSym),
01920         *srwt = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym)),
01921         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
01922     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01923     CHM_DN cbeta = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01924         ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, n, 1);
01925     R_CheckStack();
01926     
01927     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01928     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, cbeta, ceta, &c))
01929         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
01930     lme4_muEta(mu, MUETA_SLOT(x), eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
01931     lme4_varFunc(REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_varSym)), mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
01932 
01933     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
01934     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01935         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * srwt[i];
01936         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
01937     }
01938 
01939     Free(eta);
01940     return R_NilValue;
01941 }
01942 
01943 
01954 SEXP spR_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01955 {
01956     int *zp, m, n, nnz, verb = asInteger(verbP);
01957     double *Zcp, *Ztx,
01958         *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
01959         *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01960         *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01961         *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01962         *pWt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_pWtSym),
01963         *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
01964         *srwt = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym)),
01965         *tmp, *tmp2, *var = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_varSym)),
01966         *y = Y_SLOT(x), cfac, crit, one[] = {1, 0},
01967         step, wrss_old, zero[] = {0, 0};
01968     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
01969     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01970     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, Zt->ncol, 1), ctmp, sol;
01971     R_CheckStack();
01972 
01973     
01974     zp = (int*)Zt->p;
01975     m = Zt->nrow;
01976     n = Zt->ncol;
01977     nnz = zp[n];
01978     Zcp = Calloc(nnz, double);
01979     Ztx = (double*)Zt->x;
01980     tmp = Calloc(m, double);
01981     tmp2 = Calloc(m, double);
01982     ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, m, 1);
01983     cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)m);
01984     R_CheckStack();
01985 
01986     spR_update_mu(x);
01987     for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
01988         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
01989         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01990             srwt[j] = sqrt((pWt ? pWt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
01991             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
01992             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
01993             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++)
01994                 Zcp[p] = srwt[j] * muEta[j] * Ztx[p];
01995         }
01996         Zt->x = (void*)Zcp;
01997         if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Zt, zero, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01998             error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01999                   c.status, L->minor, L->n);
02000         wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
02001                                 /* tmp := Zt %*% muEta %*% var %*% wtdResid */
02002         M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
02003         Memcpy(tmp2, tmp, m);
02004         apply_perm(tmp, tmp2, (int*)L->Perm, m);
02005                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
02006         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
02007             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
02008         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
02009         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
02010                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
02011         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, m) / wrss_old;
02012         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
02013                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
02014         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
02015             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
02016         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
02017         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
02018 
02019         Memcpy(tmp2, fixef, m);
02020         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
02021             for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) fixef[j] = tmp2[j] + step * tmp[j];
02022             spR_update_mu(x);
02023             if (verb < 0)
02024                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
02025                         i, step, crit, d[wrss_POS], wrss_old, fixef[1], fixef[2]);
02026             if (d[wrss_POS] < wrss_old) {
02027                 wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
02028                 break;
02029             }
02030         }
02031         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
02032     }
02033     Free(tmp2);
02034     Free(Zcp);
02035     Free(tmp);
02036     return R_NilValue;
02037 }

02092 static void
02093 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
02094 {
02095     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
02096     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
02097         *w = Alloca(n, double),
02098         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
02099 
02100     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
02101     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
02102     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
02103     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
02104         int i, np1 = n + 1;
02105         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
02106         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
02107     }
02108 }
